Both budget hearings will be open to the public and held at the Central Office for Troy City Schools, which is located at 358 Elba Highway in Troy. Social distancing guidelines in light of the
COVID-19 pandemic will be in place. Due to these protocols, the capacity of the boardroom is restricted to twelve attendees. Seats will be available on a first-come, first-served basis. Budget
hearings will also be live-streamed for the public via Deer Stand Hill on Facebook.
